name: Bust-a-Move Deluxe
description:
Bust-A-Move is back and bursting onto the PlayStation Portable! Join Bob and Bub plus new characters, never before seen games and ways to play including spooky Ghost Mode! Pop matching colored bubbles to solve puzzles in a variety of game types including head-to-head play. Whether you are a first-timer or an expert bubble launcher, you will be sure to find brain-teasing fun in the over 1000 puzzles available in Bust-A-Move Deluxe!

Features:

    Addictive puzzle fun for casual puzzle fans to hardcore gamers
    Over 1,000 addictive game boards!
    Four new games including: Running Launcher, Mix 'Em Up, Double Shot and Time Warp puzzles exclusive to the PSP!
    Spooktacular Ghost Mode includes a tricky Ghost Bubble and Heart Meter for enhanced game play
    Challenge a friend to interactive battles in multiplayer mode
    Meet 6 new Bust-A-Move characters, including 2 unlockable characters
